title: Wuzzuf Jobs Scraper
description: Extract job listings from Wuzzuf.net for Egypt and MENA region. Search by keyword, location, category, career level, and job type. Supports JSON API with HTML fallback for reliable data extraction.

startUrl.title: Start URL
startUrl.description: Custom Wuzzuf search URL to start scraping from. If provided, overrides keyword/location/category filters.

keyword.title: Job Keyword
keyword.description: Search for specific job titles or keywords (e.g., 'Software Engineer', 'Accountant', 'Marketing Manager').

careerLevel.title: Career Level
careerLevel.description: Filter by experience level (e.g., 'Entry Level', 'Experienced', 'Manager', 'Senior Management').

jobType.title: Job Type
jobType.description: Filter by employment type (e.g., 'Full Time', 'Part Time', 'Freelance', 'Remote', 'Internship').

collectDetails.title: Collect Full Job Details
collectDetails.description: Enable to scrape complete job descriptions, requirements, and additional details from individual job pages.

results_wanted.title: Maximum Results
results_wanted.description: Maximum number of job listings to scrape. Set a reasonable limit to control runtime and costs.

max_pages.title: Maximum Pages
max_pages.description: Maximum number of search result pages to process. Each page typically contains 15 jobs.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Proxy settings for reliable scraping. Residential proxies recommended for best results.
